trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*> event in the host, and reports error information.
trans-unit.target: Termina l'istanza del flusso di lavoro in esecuzione, genera il <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>evento nell'host e riporta informazioni sull'errore.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.
trans-unit.target: Una volta il flusso di lavoro viene terminato, non può essere ripristinata.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'eccezione che ha provocato la chiusura dell'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: L'eccezione che viene passato a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>è un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>se solo <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>è impostata.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only Exception is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se viene impostata l'eccezione, solo tale eccezione viene passata al <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and Exception are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and Exception is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambi <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>e vengono impostate eccezione, un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>viene passato all'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, e l'eccezione viene impostata come l'eccezione <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: Se non è impostato, valore predefinito è <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>viene creato.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>

trans-unit.source: A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa di argomento di input con il motivo per la chiusura dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only Reason is set.
trans-unit.target: L'eccezione che viene passato a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>è un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>se solo motivo viene impostato.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>è impostata, tale eccezione viene passata al <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both Reason and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified Reason, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambi motivo e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>sono impostate, un <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>viene passata con il motivo specificato, e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>è impostato come l'eccezione <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: Se non è impostato, valore predefinito è <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>viene creato.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>
Motivo della chiusura del flusso di lavoro.
